text: Billingley is a village and civil parish in the Metropolitan Borough of Barnsley, in South Yorkshire, England, east of Barnsley. At the 2001 census it had a population of 177, increasing to 210 at the 2011 Census. ==References== ==External links== * *http://billingleyvillage.co.uk/ Category:Villages in South Yorkshire Category:Geography of the Metropolitan Borough of Barnsley Category:Civil parishes in South Yorkshire
title: Billingley
